document_data.name: ''Sword of Stalking''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''sword of stalking''''' was a highly [[magic|enchanted]] [[bastard sword]].
document_data.Description: The magical bastard sword had a ''+4'' enchantment.
document_data.History: Many decades prior to [[1358 DR]], a queen of [[spider]]s that lurked in the caverns beneath [[Waterdeep]] trapped a valiant fighter. The bastard sword that belonged to the warrior was lost to the passage of time, and was kept amongst rotting [[armor]] and refuse.
